explanation: To determine whether metal_uio_dev_bind participates in direct or indirect recursion you must examine the functions that call it and the functions those callers call. The static call graph shows metal_uio_dev_open calls metal_uio_dev_bind, so metal_uio_dev_open is required. Any function called by metal_uio_dev_open might (directly or indirectly) call back to metal_uio_dev_open or metal_uio_dev_bind and thus create an indirect recursion cycle; therefore include metal_open, metal_uio_read_map_attr, metal_map, metal_io_init, and metal_linux_irq_register_dev. Analyze the bodies/call graphs of these symbols to see if any path leads back to metal_uio_dev_bind or metal_uio_dev_open.
